title: Consilio Appoints New Managing Director
text:
Gregory Lutz Joins Consilio as MD of Sales Management in Eastern U.S.
WASHINGTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Consilio, a global leader in eDiscovery , document review , risk management and legal consulting services , announced today that Gregory Lutz has joined the firm as Managing Director in charge of the Eastern United States sales team. Lutz will report directly to Meredith Kildow, Managing Director and Senior Vice President of Global Revenue Organization.
“As we continue to focus on growing our business, Greg’s deep sales management experience will help us continue to expand our client base throughout the Eastern U.S.,” said Kildow. “Greg has a long track record of managing highly productive and motivated teams. We are confident in his ability to leverage that skill set for Consilio’s continued growth.”
Lutz brings nearly 25 years of experience in the sales management field. Prior to joining Consilio, Lutz served as a Senior Vice President at Epiq, where he was responsible for developing, motivating and managing a top-producing global sales division. Previously, Lutz was Director of Discovery Consulting, Sales and Marketing at Inference Data as well as a sales manager at Fios and LexisNexis.
About Consilio
Consilio is a global leader in eDiscovery, document review and legal consulting services. Consilio supports multinational law firms and corporations using innovative software, cost-effective managed services and deep legal and regulatory industry expertise. The company has extensive experience in litigation, HSR second requests, internal and regulatory investigations, eDiscovery, information governance and compliance, law department management, document review, contracts management and legal analytics. ISO 27001:2013 certified, the company operates offices and data centers across Europe, Asia and North America.
